specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Charmeuse This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight.
